title: Bip at a society party; Bip hunts butterflies; The Cage
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Parties
description: Episode number 2 of Series "The Art of silence: pantomimes with Marcel Marceau and his partner Pierre Verry". Marcel Marceau introduces the art of mime through the character of Bip. "Bip at a society party" portrays many amusing characters encountered at a party. "Bip hunts butterflies" is a tragic comic mime in which Bip discovers how fragile life can be. "The Cage" is an allegorical pantomime of a person struggling to escape from confinement.
